      • getWeight

        public double getWeight()
        Description copied from interface: WeightedGroundRule
        Returns the Weight of this WeightedGroundRule. Until setWeight() is called, this GroundRule's weight is the current weight of its parent Rule. After it is called, it remains the most recent Weight set by setWeight().
        Specified by:
        getWeight in interface WeightedGroundRule

      • getIncompatibility

        public double getIncompatibility()
        Description copied from interface: WeightedGroundRule
        Returns the incompatibility of the truth values of this GroundRule's GroundAtoms. Incompatibility is always non-negative.
        Specified by:
        getIncompatibility in interface WeightedGroundRule

      • getIncompatibility

        public double getIncompatibility(GroundAtom replacementAtom,
                                 float replacementValue)
        Description copied from interface: WeightedGroundRule
        Returns the incompatibility of the truth values of this GroundRule's GroundAtoms given the replacment of a single atom's value with another value. This method should only be used by callers that really know what they are doing. Incompatibility is always non-negative.
        Specified by:
        getIncompatibility in interface WeightedGroundRule
